svg.metadata: {"headers":["Release Type","Date","Goal","Completed","Selected","Lines","Lines Count"],"rows":[["M1","2023-Q1","Infrastructure Foundation","false","false","Core infrastructure setup; Containerization platform; CI/CD pipeline implementation; Monitoring and logging framework","4"],["M2","2023-Q2","Service Mesh","false","false","Service discovery; Load balancing; Traffic management; Security policies","4"],["M3","2023-Q3","Data Services","false","false","Managed database services; Data warehousing; ETL pipelines; Data analytics platform","4"],["RC1","2023-Q4","Developer Tools","false","false","Self-service portal; API gateway; Developer documentation; SDK and client libraries","4"],["GA","2024-Q1","Enterprise Features","false","false","Multi-region support; Compliance certifications; Enterprise SLAs; Advanced security features","4"]]}
